main event: A witness in Clyde, New York reported seeing three metallic, cigar-shaped objects with rotating disc-like ends that hovered and moved slowly across the sky in July and August 1967.
interesting points: The objects were silent as they moved through the sky.
The witness estimated the objects were the size of a small airplane and were metallic gray in color.
The witness reported the objects hovered and then moved at a slow speed, comparable to 50-55 mph.
The witness estimated the objects were approximately 2000 feet away.
The witness reported the objects would dim and brighten several times during the sightings, and at one point emitted a beam of light that scanned the ground.
sighted object: three metallic, cigar-shaped objects with rotating disc-like ends
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
